texto: The Motorway includes a large number of viaducts, flyovers and underpasses. Several types of deck were used for the bridges. High structures with large spans were constructed with precast segments; low structures with large spans were full-width single beams with exterior prestressing; and moderate span structures had U beams with compression slabs.

Despe-te que suas Bridge (522 feet high / 159 meters high, 607 foot span  / 185 meter span.Completed in late 2011, the Ponte “Despe-te que suas” briefly became Portugal’s highest span before the Viaduto Corgo surpassed it in 2012. Despe’s main span of 185 m is now the longest in Portugal and possibly longer then any beam spans that have been constructed in Spain. The gorge is the deepest in the Portuguese Archipelago of the Azores.
Logistics has been one of the major challenges that have faced the project. Thus, dozens of ships have transported machinery and materials between San Miguel and their maritime ports of origin.

Erosion control measures
Different treatments were designed according to the main characteristics of each cut or fill.We have to highlight the level of protection achieved by the hidromanta technique, especially in the south axis slopes, where the materials were especially unstable and prone to erosion due to their composition and poor structure.
